attributes.action: Limit Buy to Let ownership to 3 houses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much of the housing market has been fueled by the 'Buy to Let' mortgage ownership allowing some clever people to accumulate owneship of many many houses. Since introduced there have been no restrictions on the amount of houses a single person can own this has fueled a housing market already out of control. I call for a limit to ownership to 3 houses. This allows people to invest in a holiday home and a pension investment. This I think is fair and sensible and help bring the housing market under control with hiking up interest rates and thus harming everyone stretch on a mortgage.
